As of 2025-11-04

Gemini Summary

State of the Market Summary:

  • Platinum saw speculative net positioning at 23.70% and hedger net positioning at -31.60% as of 2025-11-04 [Source: Platinum_CoT_Signals.html].
  • Hedgers show the most extreme positioning, currently in a "Deep Short" regime [Source: Platinum_CoT_Signals.html]. This implies significant bearish exposure.
  • Recent 4-week flow indicates a "Long_Build" of 3.50% for Platinum [Source: Platinum_CoT_Signals.html].

Technical Summary:

  • Speculative z-score is 0.6545; hedger z-score is -1.1747 [Source: Platinum_CoT_Signals.html]. Neither is at an extreme stretch based on typical ¬±2 z-score bands.
  • No active crowding, squeeze, or exhaustion risk flags are present for Platinum [Source: Platinum_CoT_Signals.html].
  • The reversal score is 0, indicating no clear tactical reversal setup at this time [Source: Platinum_CoT_Signals.html].
